UpdateLog.description:
[title]Notes[/title][font]Tiny[/font] Updated for 1.3 [title]Bug Fixes[/title] Fixed all bugs pertaining to 1.3 update
Fixed bug where build designators would not color properly for non-maskable vehicles
Fixed bug where ghost graphic for cannons would not render properly.
Fixed bug where copy graphic build command would render neither the pattern masking nor the turrets for vehicles. [title]New Additions[/title] [b]Vehicle specific pathing[/b] Vehicles used to check path costs in the middle of finding a path, with reachability determined through 2 multithreaded paths running in opposite directions searching for fail conditions.
It sounds messy... and that's cause it was. With the new changes each vehicle will generate their own set of regions as well as their own path grid. This streamlines pathing for vehicles and will open up the door to better pathing customization like amphibious vehicles.
Vehicle regions now take the width of the vehicle into account. This makes long distance pathing considerably faster to decide if the location is reachable or not. [title]Additional Changes[/title] Removed reverse-pathing [title]Final Notes[/title][font]Tiny[/font] Please report any issues you find [link]https://github.com/SmashPhil/Vehicles/issues[/link](here.)
